column1: miss alexa ximena cerda| alexa ximena cerda
column3: went to sleep peacefully in the arms of jesus on wednesday
column4: june 17th at her residence in houston. visitation with family and friends will be held on sunday
column5: june 21st from 12:00 - 2:00pm at nobles funeral chapel in navasota. funeral service will be held at the family residence at 610 malcolm street in navasota on monday
column6: june 22nd at 10:00am with interment following at oakland cemetery. rev. rodolfo ""jo. jo"" cal-ortiz will officiate. upcoming events. visitationjun 21. 12:00 pm - 2:00 pm nobles funeral chapel402 e. blackshear st. p. o. box 190. navasota
